Desc.entry: Fosters relations with people of Scottish descent or who like Scottish people/culture and organises social and sporting activities, including country dance class. Active theatre group and arts group. Holds writers' meetings with speakers. Raises money for charity. Also holds St Andrew's Ball, Burns dinner and dance, Hogmanay party and ceilidhs. Holds other informal meetings. Now welcomes any one with in interest in Scottish culture, members no longer need to be of Scottish descent.
